org.lwjgl.opencl

Interface CLNativeKernel

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CLNativeKernel.Buf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLNativeKernel.BufAdapter

    public interface CLNativeKernel
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the EnqueueNativeKernel method. Instances may be re-used after the native kernel has been invoked.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CLNativeKernel.Buf
      Extends CLNativeKernel with an alternative version that accepts a buffer.
      static class  CLNativeKernel.BufAdapter
      A CLNativeKernel.Buf adapter.
      static class  CLNativeKernel.Util 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(long args, int cb_args)
      The native kernel implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(long args,
          int cb_args)
        The native kernel implementation.
        Parameters:
        args - a pointer to the native kernel arguments
        cb_args - the size in bytes of the args list that args points to
